title: Was the Mayor of San Juan Arrested for Misuse of Disaster Funds?
subtitle: Junk news sites reported that a "Puerto Rico mayor" was arrested on fraud charges and misleadingly used images of San Juan mayor Carmen Yulín Cruz, who has not been charged with a crime.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: San Juan mayor Carmen Yulín Cruz was arrested for misusing federal disaster relief funds.
